qas.question: When did BBC Vision change back to BBC Television?
Who is the current head of BBC Television?
What are the four responsibilities of BBC Television?
What was BBC Vision formerly known as for a few years in the early 21st century?
Who is the person who commissioning all programming on the BBC's television channels?
What is responsible for scheduling all programs?

context: As a division within the BBC, <b3_0>Television<b3_0/> was formerly known as BBC Vision for a few years in the early 21st century, until its name reverted to <b5_0>Television<b5_0/> in <a0_0>2013<a0_0/>. It is responsible for the <a2_0>commissioning, producing, scheduling and broadcasting<a2_0/> of all programming on the BBC's television channels, and is led by <a1_0><b4_0>Danny Cohen<b4_0/><a1_0/>.
